languages.text: "Они наплодили лишних ртов и восстали против своих командиров. Нас слишком мало, чтобы препятствовать этому, и уж точно мы не выдадим и одного пайка сверх нормы из-за незапланированных человеческих излишков".

"They have spawned extra mouths and rebelled against their commanders. There were too few of us to prevent this, but we will not issue a single extra ration merely over of an unplanned human surplus."
languages.original_text: "Они наплодили лишних ртов и восстали против своих командиров. Нас слишком мало, чтобы препятствовать этому, и уж точно мы не выдадим и одного пайка сверх нормы из-за незапланированных человеческих излишков".

traits.locale_text: "They have spawned extra mouths and rebelled against their commanders. There were too few of us to prevent this, but we will not issue a single extra ration because of unplanned human surplus."
"They have spawned extra mouths and rebelled against their commanders. There were too few of us to prevent this, but we will not issue a single extra ration because of unplanned human surplus."

"They have spawned extra mouths and rebelled against their commanders. There were too few of us to prevent this, but we will not issue a single extra ration merely over of an unplanned human surplus."

"They have spawned extra mouths and rebelled against their commanders. There were too few of us to prevent this, but we will not issue a single extra ration merely over of an unplanned human surplus."

"They have spawned extra mouths and rebelled against their commanders. There were too few of us to prevent this, but we will not issue a single extra ration merely over of an unplanned human surplus."

"They have spawned extra mouths and rebelled against their commanders. There were too few of us to prevent this, but we will not issue a single extra ration merely over of an unplanned human surplus."

languages.text: «Han generado bocas adicionales y se han rebelado contra sus comandantes. No éramos suficientes para evitarlo, pero no pensamos repartir una sola ración de más por un excedente humano no planificado».
languages.original_text: "They have spawned extra mouths and rebelled against their commanders. There were too few of us to prevent this, but we will not issue a single extra ration merely over of an unplanned human surplus."

traits.locale_text: «Han generado bocas adicionales y se han rebelado contra sus comandantes. No éramos suficientes para evitarlo, pero no pensamos repartir una sola ración de más por un excedente humano no planificado».

languages.text: “他们肆意繁殖，还爆发了兵变，杀害了指挥官。我们的人数太少，无法阻止发生这种情况，但我们绝不会由于计划之外的过剩人口而发放额外补给。”
languages.original_text: "They have spawned extra mouths and rebelled against their commanders. There were too few of us to prevent this, but we will not issue a single extra ration merely over of an unplanned human surplus."

traits.locale_text: “他们肆意繁殖，还爆发了兵变，杀害了指挥官。我们的人数太少，无法阻止发生这种情况，但我们绝不会由于计划之外的过剩人口而发放额外补给。”

languages.text: 「彼らは過剰な人口を生み出し、その上官に反逆しています。これを防ぐには私たちの人数は少なすぎますが、無計画な人口増加に対して単に追加の配給を実施するつもりはありません」
languages.original_text: "They have spawned extra mouths and rebelled against their commanders. There were too few of us to prevent this, but we will not issue a single extra ration merely over of an unplanned human surplus."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは過剰な人口を生み出し、その上官に反逆しています。これを防ぐには私たちの人数は少なすぎますが、無計画な人口増加に対して単に追加の配給を実施するつもりはありません」

languages.text: « Ils ont enfanté de nouvelles bouches à nourrir et se sont rebellés contre leurs commandants. Nous n'étions pas assez nombreux pour les en empêcher, mais nous ne distribuerons pas la moindre ration supplémentaire au profit d'un surplus humain imprévu. »
languages.original_text: "They have spawned extra mouths and rebelled against their commanders. There were too few of us to prevent this, but we will not issue a single extra ration merely over of an unplanned human surplus."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont enfanté de nouvelles bouches à nourrir et se sont rebellés contre leurs commandants. Nous n'étions pas assez nombreux pour les en empêcher, mais nous ne distribuerons pas la moindre ration supplémentaire au profit d'un surplus humain imprévu. »

languages.text: "Beslenecek yeni boğazlar peyda edip komutanlarına baş kaldırdılar. Önüne geçecek sayıda değildik. Ayrıca hesapta olmayan bu insan fazlalığı yüzünden fazladan tek bir kumanya bile vermeyeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "They have spawned extra mouths and rebelled against their commanders. There were too few of us to prevent this, but we will not issue a single extra ration merely over of an unplanned human surplus."

traits.locale_text: "Beslenecek yeni boğazlar peyda edip komutanlarına baş kaldırdılar. Önüne geçecek sayıda değildik. Ayrıca hesapta olmayan bu insan fazlalığı yüzünden fazladan tek bir kumanya bile vermeyeceğiz."

languages.text: "Sie haben sich wie die Karnickel vermehrt und gegen ihre Kommandeur rebelliert. Wir hatten nicht genug Leute, um das zu verhindern, aber wir werden nicht eine zusätzliche Ration für einen ungeplanten menschlichen Überschuss bereitstellen."
languages.original_text: "They have spawned extra mouths and rebelled against their commanders. There were too few of us to prevent this, but we will not issue a single extra ration merely over of an unplanned human surplus."

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben sich wie die Karnickel vermehrt und gegen ihre Kommandeur rebelliert. Wir hatten nicht genug Leute, um das zu verhindern, aber wir werden nicht eine zusätzliche Ration für einen ungeplanten menschlichen Überschuss bereitstellen."
